intro: Collinsonia canadensis, commonly known as Canadian collinsonia, is a perennial herb native to eastern North America. It belongs to the family Styracaceae and is characterized by its attractive, bell-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. Collinsonia canadensis is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and wetland habitats.
